notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: As the work pertained to Major research project sanctioned to the corresponding author Daljit Singh Arora, thus he conceptualized the work and its execution, helped in the analysis of the data and drafting of manuscript as well. Navdeep Kaur has been associated with the experimental aspect of the manuscript. Namarta Kalia and Manpreet Kaur have been designed and performed the antiproliferative studies.
